name: Pregnenolone
description: The "mother hormone" — precursor to all steroid hormones including DHEA, progesterone, cortisol, testosterone, and estrogen. Levels decline dramatically with age. Supports cognitive function, mood, and hormonal balance.

dosage.notes: Start low (10mg). Can convert to multiple downstream hormones. Monitor with blood tests. Take in morning.

keyFindings: Improved memory and cognitive performance in small human trials
Enhanced myelination and neuroplasticity in preclinical studies
sideEffects: Hair loss (if converts heavily to androgens)
